clusters.title: Doctor sexual misconduct hearings too lenient, review suggests
clusters.neutral_headline: Doctor sexual misconduct hearings too lenient, review suggests

items.title: Doctor sexual misconduct hearings too lenient, review suggests

items.content: Sanctions for UK doctors guilty of sexual misconduct are too lenient in around a quarter of cases, reports suggest.
